name: Lost In Iquea
description:
Lost in Iquêá is a short game made in under a week with GB Studio for a university project.

Features

  • Experience a stroll through IKEA
  • Meet questionable NPCs
  • An introspective view on clowns and feelings
  • Original soundtrack

Controls

Credits

Cecy (@_excetera) - Backgrounds, Coding, Sprites, Level Design

Francisco (@seainbetween) - Level Design, Game Design, Narrative, Sprites

 Marta (@meepmeepawoooo) - Character Sprites, Music & SFX
